Name: Charge!
Description: Elite Shout. (5...11...13 seconds.) Allies in earshot move 33% faster. [Initial effect]: these allies lose Crippled condition.

Name: For Great Justice!
Description: Shout. (20 seconds.) You gain 100% more adrenaline.

Name: For Great Justice! (PvP)
Description: Shout. (8 seconds.) You gain 1 extra strike of adrenaline whenever you hit with an attack.

Name: Shields Up!
Description: Shout. (5...10...11 seconds.) Party members in earshot have +60 armor against projectile attacks.

Name: Watch Yourself!
Description: Shout. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have +5...21...25 armor. Ends after 10 incoming attacks.

Name: Watch Yourself! (PvP)
Description: Shout. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have +5...21...25 armor. Ends after 1...3...3 incoming attack[s].

Name: Axe Rake
Description: Axe Attack. Deals +1...8...10 damage and inflicts Crippled condition (15 seconds) if target foe has a Deep Wound.

Name: Balanced Stance
Description: Stance. (8...18...20 seconds.) You cannot be knocked-down and do not take extra damage from critical hits.

Name: Battle Rage
Description: Elite Stance. (5...17...20 seconds.) You move 33% faster and gain double adrenaline from your attacks. Ends if you use any non-adrenal skills.

Name: Berserker Stance
Description: Stance. (5...10...11 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and gain 50% more adrenaline. Ends if you use a skill.

Name: Bull's Strike
Description: Melee Attack. Deals +5...25...30 damage and causes knock-down if target foe is moving.

Name: Cleave
Description: Elite Axe Attack. Deals +10...26...30 damage.

Name: Counter Blow
Description: Hammer Attack. Causes knock-down if target foe is attacking.

Name: Cyclone Axe
Description: Axe Attack. Deals +4...10...12 damage to all foes adjacent to you.

Name: Defensive Stance
Description: Stance. (1...4...5 second[s].) You have 75% chance to block. End effect: gain one adrenaline for each melee attack skill you have (maximum 0...3...4).

Name: Devastating Hammer
Description: Elite Hammer Attack. Causes knock-down. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...17...20 seconds).

Name: Dismember
Description: Axe Attack. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds).

Name: Disrupting Chop
Description: Axe Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: interrupted skill is disabled for +20 seconds.

Name: Distracting Blow
Description: Melee Attack. Also attacks foes adjacent to your target. Interrupts an action. Hits for no damage.

Name: Endure Pain
Description: Skill. (7...16...18 seconds.) You have +90...258...300 maximum Health.

Name: Executioner's Strike
Description: Axe Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage.

Name: Final Thrust
Description: Sword Attack. Deals +1...32...40 damage. Deals +1...32...40 more damage if target foe is below 50% Health. Lose all adrenaline.

Name: Frenzy
Description: Stance. (8 seconds.) You attack 33% faster. You take double damage.

Name: Gash
Description: Sword Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage and inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds) if your target is Bleeding.

Name: Hammer Bash
Description: Hammer Attack. Causes knock-down. Lose all adrenaline.

Name: Hamstring
Description: Sword Attack. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...13...15 seconds).

Name: Healing Signet
Description: Signet. You gain 82...154...172 Health. You have -40 armor while using this skill.

Name: Heavy Blow
Description: Hammer Attack. Deals +1...24...30 damage and causes knock-down if target foe is Weakened. Lose all adrenaline.

Name: Hundred Blades
Description: Elite Skill. (15 seconds.) Deals 10...22...25 slashing damage to all adjacent foes whenever you attack with a sword.

Name: Irresistible Blow
Description: Hammer Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Deals 5...17...20 damage and causes knock-down if blocked.

Name: Mighty Blow
Description: Hammer Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage.

Name: Power Attack
Description: Melee Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage.

Name: Savage Slash
Description: Sword Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: deals +1...32...40 damage if action was a spell.

Name: Seeking Blade
Description: Sword Attack. Deals +1...16...20 damage. Deals 1...16...20 damage and inflicts Bleeding condition (25 seconds) if blocked.

Name: Seven Weapons Stance
Description: Elite Stance. (3...17...20 seconds.) Weapon attributes are increased by +1...12...15. You attack 33% faster. PvE Skill

Name: Sever Artery
Description: Sword Attack. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...21...25 seconds).

Name: Shield Bash
Description: Skill. (5...10...11 seconds.) You block of next attack skill. Causes knock-down and +15 second recharge if it was a melee skill. No effect unless you are wielding a shield.

Name: Sprint
Description: Stance. (8...13...14 seconds.) You move 25% faster.

Name: Staggering Blow
Description: Hammer Attack. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...17...20 seconds).

Name: Swift Chop
Description: Axe Attack. Deals +1...16...20 damage. Deals 1...16...20 damage and inflicts Deep Wound condition (20 seconds) if blocked.

Name: Thrill of Victory
Description: Melee Attack. Deals +20...36...40 damage. If you have more Health than your target

Name: Warrior's Cunning
Description: Skill. (5...10...11 seconds.) Your melee attacks are unblockable.

Name: Wild Blow
Description: Melee Attack. Always a critical hit. Removes a stance. Unblockable. Lose all adrenaline.
